title: Life In General - Life In General EP (1982)
description:
Life In General - Life In General EP (1982)

There's very little information about this band. This EP has no text on it at all apart from the band name. From the internet we can deduce that they are Seattle-based, and were formerly known as X-15 where they appeared as part of the compilation "Seattle Syndrome Volume One" in 1981. Guitarist Eric Alton later appeared on Gary Heffern's 1997 release "Askew".

Wikipedia's entry on X-15: "X-15 is an American rock band formed in Bellingham, Washington in 1979 by lead singer Kelly Mitchell, guitarist Eric Alton, bass player Tim Lollar, keyboardist Erik Rohrer, and drummer Todd Fuhs. They are best known as one of the most successful alternative bands operating out of Seattle during the years 1980 through 1987, leading up to the Seattle grunge explosion, and for their cult-classic song "Vaporized"."

TRACK LIST:
A1 Respite Lost
A2 The Fog
B1 Thats Life
B2 Affliction
B3 One Way
